content:
# The attempt to craft a **Stone Furnace** has failed because it requires stone, which must be gathered first. This indicates that I currently do not have any stone in my inventory.
#
# Given the current situation where I cannot harvest any resources, craft items, or progress further, it seems that I have reached a deadlock.
#
# To move forward, I will need to gather stone first. This will allow me to craft the stone furnace, which can then be used to smelt iron ore into iron plates.
#
# I will now search for a nearby stone resource patch to gather the necessary stone.

# Moving to the nearest stone resource patch to gather stone.
move_to(nearest(Resource.Stone))  # Move to the nearest stone resource patch.
